description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. Classic ASCII dungeon crawling on your Xbox! Customize the game with remappable ASCII and graphical tiles, play with the precision of a keyboard or ChatPad, use your Avatar as the hero, and prove you're the best on the Global Scoreboards. Unlock a slew of Awardments while enjoying endless gameplay, with an infinite number of dungeons to loot!
